text: 10/10 atmosphere on the east coast - cheap drinks and great food. met the friendly people when I came alone & made some new friends! working staff was very helpful as well. Keep it up!

I like this place as I don't need to travel to town and I can experience a chilled and nice ambience too.

Their tapas was great, especially their self created cocktail that's very affordable and unique.

It's the perfect place to hangout! I've been back a few times!

I recently visited this neighbourhood bar and was thoroughly impressed. The atmosphere is incredibly relaxed and chill, making it a perfect spot to unwind. The drinks are reasonably priced and consistently well-made for both cocktails and mocktails. It’s exactly what you’d hope for in a local hangout. Service is great and everyone is very attentive even when it gets busy. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a great, laid-back experience!

went on friday night and was super pleased with my experience! the atmosphere was very vibey (there was even a dj!), the food was good, and the staff were friendly and patient. will definitely come back for the black bean taco & fries. cocktails were goood too!

This place feels like a first date.... exciting, a little mysterious, and definitely something you’ll be thinking about later. The drinks? Smooth like the DJ’s set. The vibe? So good it almost convinced me I’m a better dancer than I am. If you’re looking for a spot to sip, mingle, and maybe meet your next bad decision, this is it. 11/10, would flirt with strangers here again. Would recommend to family and friends!
